text: Viaŋ maci mɨdɨŋ human limu sɨkuala haman agɨladɨ mɨŋa sɨkɨ sɨkɨ lɨlɨŋ kulaŋ 5,000 haman agɨlaŋ navalɨ uamalɨ. Navɨci ci lɨci sɨmɨŋ sɨka sɨka hɨnevalɨ agɨladɨ cinacina abaman agɨladɨ hɨvɨ hudahalaŋ uamalɨ. Lɨci nudɨ kulemɨlɨ agɨlaŋ abavɨmalɨ. Human limu limu sɨkuala hɨcɨ limu akica cɨjɨŋ haman agɨladɨ hɨvɨ hudakɨlu uavɨmalɨ.
